title: The left-wing activists are demanding that the New York Museum drop the statue of Theodore Roosevelt?
subtitle: The clashes with neo-Nazis in Charlottesville did not inspire the "leftists" to demand the removal of the statue of Theodore Roosevelt in New York City.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: After "the request from the southern states to drop the statues of Confederate characters, the activist on the left is now targeting" the New York City statue of President Teddy Roosevelt.
